project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch the current weather data for a given city
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement user input functionality to allow users to enter a city name
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
